backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, registrant CRUD, search, and user badge creation using AccessControl and Map structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs for deployment verification and diagnostics.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, components, hooks, styling, deployment utilities, and 3D world features.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide explaining build, deployment, verification, diagnostics, URL correctness, and troubleshooting for canister IDs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining warm OKLCH-themed CSS variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and layout components including profile modal.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout with navigation, authentication, user badge display, deployment mismatch banner, and footer, wrapping routed content.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity and handles login edge cases and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentInfo.t: Shows deployment diagnostics in a popover, including canister mismatch alerts and copyable deployment fields.
frontend/src/components/OisyWalletNavIte: Renders a wallet navigation item that adapts to authentication and configuration state and opens the Oisy wallet URL when available.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter a display name and saves it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/world/PlanetWorl: Renders a rotating 3D planet scene with animated inhabitants using React Three Fiber and dynamically marks new additions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides user state by fetching profile, role, and admin status via the actor and indicates authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login state, stored identities, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and registrants via the backend actor, including search, count, and invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Defines a query hook to fetch or create the user's badge using the actor and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Implements a directory view with search, filtering, admin deletion, and UI states for loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays a static events page outlining completed and upcoming steps in the Web3 onboarding flow.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero content, features, and navigation to registration or directory pages.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Implements the user registration form with validation, badge fetching, existing data loading, and registrant submission.
frontend/src/pages/WorldPage.tsx: Page showing a 3D planet visualization tied to registrant count, with authentication gating and real‑time loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentInfo.ts: Utility for inferring deployment network and canister IDs from env vars and hostname, with mismatch detection and diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/oisyWallet.ts: Reads and validates the OISY wallet URL from environment variables and exposes a simple config check.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/worldPlacement.ts: Generates deterministic 3D positions and colors for inhabitants on a sphere using golden‑angle distribution.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature tracking.
